name: Dank Dinosaur Simulator 2015
description:
Aint u evr wanted to be a dinosuar m8? What are ya bloody stupid? take on the role of a green dinosaur frum prehistoric times an get ur dino girlfriend a bite of mammof meat. climb the treacherous volcano n kill cavemen. theres a triceratops look out for him. don't step in the lava or get hit by a meteor. if u gonna impress ur dino gf u gotta be fast.

-Controls

-Left/Right 2 move

-Z 2 sprint

- R 2 restart

made for /r/webgames 1st GameJam "Prehistoric" by user BigGuy_4U
